V.iii.4.A.3.a
.
Types of Chronic Upper Respiratory Tract Infections
Chronic upper respiratory tract infections include
chronic rhinitis
chronic sinusitis
chronic tonsillitis, and
chronic laryngitis.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A - Respiratory Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A
